ph_input_file_url: Enter file URL, type / to insert variable
ph_input_voice_id: Enter parameter value, type / to insert variable
msg_voice_id_desc: The voice_id for cloning. Example: "MiniMax001". Length range [8,256]. First character must be a letter. Allows numbers, letters, _. Last character cannot be -._. Cannot duplicate existing IDs.
tip_audio_file: Sample audio for voice cloning. Providing this parameter helps enhance voice similarity and stability in speech synthesis.
tip_text: Text corresponding to the sample audio, must match the audio content, and end with punctuation
ph_input_sample_text: Enter text corresponding to sample audio, type / to insert variable
tip_preview_text: Clone preview parameters, limited to 1000 characters. The model will use the cloned voice to read this text and return a preview audio link.
ph_input_preview_text: Enter preview text for cloning, type / to insert variable
tip_small_language_recognition: Whether to enhance recognition of specified small languages and dialects. Default value is null, can be set to auto to let the model decide automatically.
tip_preview_audio_model: Specify the speech model for synthesizing preview audio. This field is required when providing the text field.
tip_noise_reduction: Audio cloning parameter, whether to enable noise reduction
tip_volume_normalization: Audio cloning parameter, whether to enable volume normalization
tip_audio_rhythm_mark: Whether to add audio rhythm mark at the end of synthesized preview audio
msg_select_model_first: Please select a speech model first
